title: Putin Clings to Market Economy Amid Sanctions
itunes:title: Putin Clings to Market Economy Amid Sanctions
description:
Bloomberg News Renewable Energy and Climate Change Reporter Will Mathis shares his Big Take story about Europe's wartime mission to ditch Russian oil and gas. Bloomberg News Federal Reserve Reporter Matt Boesler discusses how the fallout from Russian President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine is starting to come into focus as the economy becomes increasingly closed off from the outside world. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Senior Reporter for International Affairs Marc Champion talk about Marc's Businessweek Magazine cover story Putin’s Endgame Starts to Look Like Reducing Ukraine to Rubble. Fran Katsoudas, Chief People, Policy & Purpose Officer at Cisco, discusses the company's efforts to relocate employees out of Ukraine. And we Drive to the Close with David Dietze, Senior Portfolio Strategist at Peapack Private Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
